products.name: The American Felling Axe
products.story: Designed from the ground up in New York City by Best Made Company, tested the world over. The American Felling Axe has a 4lb Dayton pattern head, perhaps one of the most iconic American axe head designs, which is drop forged in the United States from an American-made 5160 alloy steel that is hardened to a Rockwell hardness of 54-56 HRC.
products.specs: Designed by Best Made,      Company, 4lb Dayton head, Best Made Axe Manual, Embroidered badge. 35”h x 7.5”w x 1.5”d
products.materials: 5160 American alloy steel, 35 in. fine grain Appalachian hickory, Bridle leather sheath, Hand-made wood crate*

products.name: The Gerstner 41D Chest for Best Made
products.story: Made in Ohio since the 1930s, the 41D chest has remained the steady favorite of machinists, carpenters, and collectors. Our version of the 41D will be available only in a limited quantity for a very short time. This special collaboration with the 108-year-old case maker starts with kiln-dried American cherry that is plain sawn and finished with solid brass hardware.
products.specs: Hand-applied stain and lacquer finish, Tongue and groove construction, Hand-fitted drawers and panels, Locking front panel, Best Made ruler scale laser-etched onto top surface, Custom embroidery inside, 20 in. x 10.5 in. x 13.5 in. New cherry tool cabinets will darken over time
products.materials: Kiln-dried plain sawn American cherry, Polished brass hardware, Industrial felt lined compartments for moisture and abrasion protection

products.name: The Quilted Indigo Overshirt
products.story: Made in Portugal of indigo-dyed cotton, its eye-catching 3 in. x 3 in. quilted stitches are designed for comfort and will trap the warmth. Double needle stitching around the reinforced Best Made 'cuff-to-elbow' patches and triple needle stitching around the shoulders make it a durable workhorse you'll rely on year after year. Should be worn as an extra layer for a dash to the log shed or gearing up for a full day of work, this over shirt doesn't sacrifice comfort for toughness.
products.specs: Rounded edges at pockets, cuffs, and collar stand, Single-needle stitches at hems, Double-needle stitches throughout placket, collar, cuffs, and pocket, Triple-needle stitch back to front on shoulders
products.materials: Plainweave Fabric (100% Cotton), Poly Fill, Indigo
